attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a survivor of eight years of domestic abuse . I have now been free from abuse for 13 months . It is the best thing I ever did but it has not been easy. The lack of protection for victims and children shocks me . A register would provide autorities involed to be aware of the situation victims find themselfs in as perpetrators have often commited these offenses before . Also the nature of this beaast is denial by the perpetrator a register would put an end to this part of the abuse . Domestic abuse is every ones responsabilit to stamp it out . Please sign my petition and help many victims and survivors like myself . Thankyou Julie Bishop

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "To create a register of habitual perpertrators of domestic abuse. This register should be accessable to all autorities ie local autorities , the police, GPs ,Schools etc.Many victims of domestic abuse come into contact at some point with one or all of these authoriteis . I would also want the victim of the abuse to have knowledge that the perpertrator is registered on it Perpertrators registered should be monitored by the police and adequate protection should be offered to the victim and any chidren involved."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20559
